name: zjax
description: Zjax is a tiny Javascript library that makes it possible to add modern SPA-like interactivity to a website by sprinkling "z-tag" attributes onto plain HTML elements.

scripts.size: gzip -c dist/zjax.min.js | wc -c | awk '{print "Gzipped and minified size: " $1 / 1024 " KB"}'

author: Codepilot SF
